ygData.subject: Re: juggling justified
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, I have to say, This was a funny as hell post ..... 8) Talonstar Wandering minstral of E ci ... From: John Robertson  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, I have to say, This was a funny as hell post .....
8)
Talonstar Wandering minstral of E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 5:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] juggling justified


> From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
> If you need to justify juggling (and I mean the "if" part - it's a game
> people), then think of it like I do.
>
> Imagine the following songs are magical.
>
> Jyzan starts singing, "If you're happy and you know it clap your hands!"
> *clap *clap*
>
> (You start to feel happy)
>
> Jyzan suddenly switches songs, "You gotta FIGHT... for your RIGHT... to
> PARTY!"
>
> (You still feel sort of happy, but know you're feeling boisterous, like
> you want to party)
>
> Jyzan switches again, "My baby takes the mornin' train, he works from
> nine to find and then!"
>
> (You're still sort of happy, though it's about to fade, you're still
> feeling boisterous, but now you want to puke too)
>
> :)
>
> Jyzan
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Having difficulty getting "in synch" with list members?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Try ONElist's Shared Calendar to organize events, meetings and more!
>
